snippet: A man thought to have a gun was apprehended on Saturday night at a Trump rally in Reno, Nev., but no weapon was found, the Secret Service said, and the man was released....
abstract: Donald Trump rally in Reno, Nev, is interrupted and candidate is rushed off stage by Secret Service after attendee mistakenly shouted that someone in crowd had gun.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MICHAEL BARBARO
byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Reno, and Michael Barbaro from New York. Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting from New York, and Michael S. Schmidt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: A man thought to have a gun was apprehended on Saturday night at a Trump rally in Reno, Nev., but no weapon was found, the Secret Service said, and the man was released.

headline.main: Donald Trump Rushed Offstage by Secret Service Agents
headline.print_headline: Cry of ‘Gun’ Prompts Secret Service to Rush Trump Offstage During a Rally in Reno
